Logic Analysis: Contains Game class and its methods, Deck class, Card class, Player class, and Dealer class. Handles game logic, card shuffling, dealing, and score calculation.
Contains Main class with methods to start the game and show help. Interacts with the Game class to manage the game flow.
Shared Knowledge: `game.py` contains the core game logic and data structures. `main.py` handles the command-line interface and user interactions.
Anything UNCLEAR: Clarification needed on whether specific blackjack rules or variations such as splitting, doubling down, or insurance need to be implemented.
